import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/card'; import { Badge } from './ui/badge'; import { Button } from './ui/button'; import { Camera, Activity, AlertTriangle, Clock, TrendingUp, TrendingDown, Eye, MapPin, ChevronRight, ShieldCheck } from 'lucide-react'; import { Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableHeader, TableRow } from './ui/table'; import { Alert, AlertDescription, AlertTitle } from './ui/alert'; // Datos para las tarjetas de indicadores clave (KPI) const kpiData = [ { title: 'Cámaras Registradas', value: '24', subtitle: '+2 esta semana', change: '+8.3%', trend: 'up', icon: Camera, color: 'text-blue-600', bgColor: 'bg-blue-100', }, { title: 'Cámaras Activas', value: '18', subtitle: '6 inactivas', change: '75%', trend: 'neutral', icon: Activity, color: 'text-emerald-600', bgColor: 'bg-emerald-100', }, { title: 'Incidentes Hoy', value: '7', subtitle: '-3 vs ayer', change: '-30%', trend: 'down', icon: AlertTriangle, color: 'text-amber-600', bgColor: 'bg-amber-100', }, { title: 'Última Alerta', value: '5 min', subtitle: 'CAM-001', change: 'Reciente', trend: 'neutral', icon: Clock, color: 'text-rose-600', bgColor: 'bg-rose-100', }, ]; // Datos para la tabla de actividad reciente const recentActivity = [ { id: 1, weaponType: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.94, camera: 'CAM-001', cameraName: 'Entrada Principal', location: 'Edificio A - Piso 1', timestamp: '14:32:15', date: '09/02/2026', severity: 'high' }, { id: 2, weaponType: 'Rifle', confidence: 0.87, camera: 'CAM-005', cameraName: 'Estacionamiento', location: 'Zona Externa', timestamp: '13:18:42', date: '09/02/2026', severity: 'critical' }, { id: 3, weaponType: 'Cuchillo', confidence: 0.76, camera: 'CAM-012', cameraName: 'Pasillo Norte', location: 'Edificio B - Piso 2', timestamp: '12:05:28', date: '09/02/2026', severity: 'medium' }, { id: 4, weaponType: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.91, camera: 'CAM-003', cameraName: 'Recepción', location: 'Edificio A - Planta Baja', timestamp: '11:44:11', date: '09/02/2026', severity: 'high' }, { id: 5, weaponType: 'Objeto Sospechoso', confidence: 0.68, camera: 'CAM-008', cameraName: 'Salida Trasera', location: 'Zona Externa', timestamp: '10:22:33', date: '09/02/2026', severity: 'low' }, ]; export function Dashboard() { return (
